title: The Power of Prayer
excerpt: Prayer is our direct line to God. Through prayer, we receive strength, peace, and guidance.
author: Overseer Dr. Joseph

title: Trusting God in All Seasons
excerpt: Trusting God means depending on Him completely, not on our own understanding
author: Overseer Dr. Joseph

title: Faith in Difficult Times
excerpt: Difficult moments test our faith, but God promises never to leave us
author: Overseer Dr. Joseph

title: Living a Thankful Life
excerpt: Thankfulness shifts our focus from problems to God’s goodness
author: Overseer Dr. Joseph

title: Walking in Love
excerpt: God’s love is patient, kind, and forgiving

title: Finding Peace in the Storm
excerpt: In turbulent times, we can find a peace that surpasses all understanding. Discover how to anchor your soul.
author: Overseer Dr. Joseph
